name: bonemerang
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Throws a bone boomerang
that strikes twice.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Throws a bone boomerang
that strikes twice.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user throws a
bone that hits the
foe once, then once
again on return.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user throws the
bone it holds. The
bone loops to hit the
foe twice, coming and
going.

The user throws the
bone it holds. The
bone loops to hit the
foe twice, coming and
going.
